    • Method Detail

      • showMenu

        public void showMenu()
        Performs all necessary actions to make this menu show up. Creates all neccessary components. Continue button is showed only if game is paused.
        Specified by:
        showMenu in class Menu

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent ae)
        Reacts to an actionEvent, a button press for instance.
        Parameters:
        ae - ActionEvent that triggered this method.

      • continuePressed

        public void continuePressed()
        React to the Continue button being pressed. Return to the game if it's paused.

      • newGamePressed

        public void newGamePressed()
        React to the New Game button being pressed. Start a new game.

      • settingsPressed

        public void settingsPressed()
        React to the Settings button being pressed. Go to the Settings menu.

      • highscorePressed

        public void highscorePressed()
        React to the High Score button being pressed. Go to the High Score menu.

      • creditsPressed

        public void creditsPressed()
        React to the Credits button being pressed. Go to the Credits menu.

      • exitPressed

        public void exitPressed()
        React to the Exit button being pressed. Ends the program.
